javadoc: An interface for a generic random-access byte provider, plus mutation methods.

methods.name: writeByte
methods.comment: Writes a byte at the specified index.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index to write the byte

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to write at the specified index

methods.name: writeBytes
methods.comment: Writes a byte array at the specified index.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index to write the byte array

params.name: values
params.comment: the values to write at the specified index

name: MutableByteProvider
comment: An interface for a generic random-access byte provider, plus mutation methods.
